Class Transition

java.lang.Object
org.pneditor.petrinet.models.lachguer.souissi.Transition
public class Transition extends Object
Transition class representing a transition in the Petri net. Manages the exiting (ExArc) and entering (EnArc) arcs and determines if the transition can fire.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transition()
    Constructor for creating a Transition with empty lists of arcs.

    Checks if the transition is feasible, i.e., if all output arcs are active.

      public Transition()

  • Method Details

    • isFeasible

      public boolean isFeasible()
      Checks if the transition is feasible, i.e., if all output arcs are active.
      Returns:
      True if the transition can fire, otherwise false.

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the transition by firing all exiting and entering arcs, if feasible.

    • emptyArcsList

      public void emptyArcsList()
      Empties the lists of arcs, removing all associations with places.
